This 4-star resort is located in a quiet area in Can Tho City, close to Can Tho town. The resort is ideally situated on the banks of the Hau River. Victoria Can Tho Resor t blends colonial-style architecture with modern comforts. It is set amidst gardens with exotic plants, where guests can relax while enjoying meals or drinks.Victoria Can Tho is only a 20-minute drive away from the new Can Tho Airport, which links Hanoi to the Mekong delta.The resortâs Victoria Spa is situated by the river, offering 7 treatment roomswhere guests can enjoy a variety of massages, from the traditional Vietnamese massage, to a full-length therapeutic massage.The Victoria Can Tho's restaurant overlooks the Hau River, with both indoor and outdoor seating areas. Guests are served European and Vietnamese cuisine, prepared by the hotelâs French chef. After a day of exploring the local area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All offer a mini bar, slippers and tea and coffee making facilities. For guests who enjoy discovering local dining options, there is a large variety within walking distance. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Can Tho. 
Fortuneland hotel is located at 141 Tran Van Kheo, Cai Khe Ward, Ninh Kieu District, Can Tho. From the hotel, you can visit to Can Tho bridge, go shopping at Cai Khe market or Cai Rang floating market about 6km to enjoy the beauty of Can Tho’s culture. 
The hotel in Can Tho consists of 171 elegant rooms. Each room is equipped TV, air conditioning, safety deposit box, mini bar, hair dryer, Wi-Fi, interior, bathtub, slippers ... In addition, the hotel also quality services such as swimming pool, fitness room, conference room, restaurant, massage ... They are things that make your vacation more comfortable when you booking a room here. 
The restaurant of Fortuneland hotel is convergence of Asian and international buffet. It is the best place for you to enjoy an interesting cuisine experience. Besides, Pool Bar is the ideal choice to enjoy diversity cocktail. Your vacation in Can Tho will be interested by quality facilities and services when booking a room at the 4-star hotel.
